Top 10 International Primary Schools in HCMC

Top 10 International Primary Schools in HCMC

An international primary school is a high-quality education option that many parents want to choose for their children. However, many parents will feel confused when seeing a list of international schools. Let’s join Tesla Primary International School to take a look the top 10 prestigious International Primary Schools in HCMC!

1. Tesla Education – IB World School

Tesla is the only school in Tan Binh District that provides the integrated International Baccalaureate (IB) programme from Primary Years Programme (PYP) to Middle Years Programme (MYP) to Diploma Programme (DP). Tesla offers a diverse learning environment, while ensuring the rigorous standards of the IB Organization, at the same time preserving Vietnamese culture and language for students on the path to becoming global citizens.

Tuition fee: From 137,000,000 VND/academic year to 400,000,000 VND/academic year.

Contact information:

– Address: 171B Hoang Hoa Tham, Ward 13, Tan Binh District, HCMC (Gate on C3 Street).

– Telephone: 098 494 8080 – 028 7307 9889

– Website: https://www.tesla.edu.vn/en

– Email: admissions@tesla.edu.vn

Tesla – Primary School

2. International Primary School of Ho Chi Minh City (ISHCMC)

ISHCMC can be considered one of the first international schools in HCMC. ISHCMC is authorized to teach all 3 International Baccalaureate (IB) programs, including: Primary Years Programme (PYP), Middle Years Programme (MYP), Diploma Programme (DP).

Tuition fee: From 620,000,000 VND/academic year to 680,000,000 VND/academic year.

Contact information:

– Address: 28 Vo Truong Toan, Ward An Phu, Thu Duc City, HCMC.

– Telephone: 028 3898 9100

– Website: https://www.ishcmc.com/

3. British Vietnamese Primary International School (BVIS)

In addition to the international standard curriculum, BVIS focuses on educating students about the importance of maintaining the national language and culture. British Vietnamese Primary International School aims to develop generations of global citizens and improve their personal awareness. The students are accompanied by a team of enthusiastic teachers, have many opportunities to promote their talents, discover their interests and nurture their passions.

Tuition fee: Being updated.

Contact information:

– Address: 44 – 46 Street No. 1, Ward Binh Hung, Binh Chanh District, HCMC.

– Telephone: 028 3758 8033

– Website: https://www.nordangliaeducation.com/

BVIS is among the top 10 prestigious International Primary Schools in HCMC

4. British Primary International School (BIS)

The British Primary International School offers an education of British standards and is rated by the British Government as an “excellent school in every category”. At primary level, children follow the English National Curriculum and the International Primary Curriculum. The school’s goal is to encourage students to reach their full potential and succeed in school and life.

Tuition fee: From 580,000,000 VND/academic year to 650,000,000 VND/academic year.

Contact information:

– Address: 225 Nguyen Van Huong, Ward Thao Dien, Thu Duc City, HCMC.

– Telephone: 028 3744 2335

– Website: https://www.nordangliaeducation.com/our-schools/vietnam/ho-chi-minh-city/bis

5. European Primary International School (EIS)

EIS provides the International Baccalaureate (IB) programme at every level, including: Primary, Middle school, High school. The European International School is a place where students get to experience a diverse of challenging learning activities.

Tuition fee: From 440,000,000 VND/academic year to 560,000,000 VND/academic year.

Contact information:

– Address: 730F-G-K Le Van Mien, Ward Thao Die, Thu Duc City, HCMC.

– Telephone: 028 7300 7257

– Website: https://www.eishcmc.com/

6. Australian Primary International School (AIS)

AIS is the only international school in Ho Chi Minh City that has an international standard boarding area. The school welcomes students from all over the world and teaches from Kindergarten to Year 13. The Australian International School focuses on the academic development of students, while encouraging them to develop their full talents and confidence to shine.

Tuition fee: From 500,000,000 VND/academic year to 590,000,000 VND/academic year.

Contact information:

– Address: 264 Mai Chi Tho, Ward An Phu, Thu Duc City, HCMC.

– Telephone: 028 3742 4040

– Website: https://www.ais.edu.vn/

7. Western Australian Primary International School (WASS)

Western Australia Primary International School teaches at all levels from Kindergarten to High School. The school implements the Western Australian State program from pre-primary to the end of grade 10. WASS provides the young generation with a modern, dynamic and capable educational environment on par with students from advanced countries around the world.

Tuition fee: From 120,000,000 VND/academic year to 140,000,000 VND/academic year.

Contact information:

– Address: 43 Nguyen Thong, Ward Vo Thi Sau, District 3, HCMC.

– Telephone: 0963 999 701 – (028) 7109 5077

– Website: https://wass.edu.vn/en/

8. Renaissance Primary International School Saigon

Renaissance Primary International School is fully accredited by the Council of International Schools (CIS) and is the only Round Square certified school in Vietnam. The curriculum for Primary school is based on the British National Curriculum and the International Primary Curriculum (IPC) framework. Renaissance is the only school in Vietnam recognized as a member of the Round Square Organization.

Tuition fee: From 240,000,000 VND/academic year to 270,000,000 VND/academic year.

Contact information:

– Address: 74 Nguyen Thi Thap, Ward Binh Thuan, District 7, HCMC.

– Telephone: 028 3773 3171

– Website: https://www.renaissance.edu.vn/

Renaissance Primary International School

9. Vietnam Talent Primary International School (UTS)

UTS provides an international bilingual education with the mission of “dedicated to nurturing talents”. The Primary School program provides students with a safe, healthy environment and gives them the confidence to become global citizens. Programs at UTS include: National program, International program (Oxford International program – UK, Common Core International program – USA) and Nurturing Talent program.

Tuition fee: From 155,000,000 VND/academic year to 170,000,000 VND/academic year.

Contact information:

– Address:

+ Campus 1: 69/68 Đang Thuy Tram, Ward 13, District Binh Thanh, HCMC.

+ Campus 2: 360D Ben Van Do, Ward 1, District 4, HCMC.

– Telephone: (028) 710 78887

– Website: https://utschool.edu.vn/en/

10. Vietnamese American Primary International Schools (VASS)

Vietnamese American Schools was founded with the mission to develop a young generation of “Good at Vietnamese, Fluent in English, Full of life skills”, to become responsible and brave enough to integrate into the world. VASS offers a bilingual program, which combines the program of the Ministry of Education and Training with the ESL program under the international certificate system of Cambridge University.

Tuition fee: From 90,000,000 VND/academic year to 110,000,000 VND/academic year.

Contact information:

– Address: 242 Cong Hoa, Ward 12, Tan Binh District, HCMC.

– Telephone: 0916 303 252

– Website: https://vaschools.edu.vn/en/
